result.execSummary:
The defendant Darius D Driver was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

of Right to Seek Postconviction Relief filed

3:21 pm Def appears via video conference from the Vernon Co. Jail.  Atty Renee Dehn.  Intern T. McGuire and Atty Timothy Jon Gruenke appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Plea Questionnaire filed - signed/understands.  No threats/force/coercion.
15CM-528  Count 1 - Obstructing an Officer as a Repeater   GUILTY.
15CM-531  Count 2 - Disorderly Conduct   GUILTY.    Count 1 - Dismissed but read-in
16CM-155   Count 1 - Disorderly Conduct while armed  NO CONTEST.  Count 2 - Dismissed but read-in
15CM-1160  Count 2 - Criminal Trespass to Dwelling  GUILTY.  Count 3 - Disorderly Conduct  GUILTY.  Count 4 -  Bail Jumping (new crime)  GUILTY.    Count 1 - Dismissed but read-in
COURT is satisfied that the pleas are F, I & V made.  Sufficient factual basis.  Found guilty and convicted.
McGuire comments and recommends confinement.  He's currently on probation.  Dehn comments.  Driver comments.  Court comments.
SENTENCES:
16CM-155  DC and 15CM-531 DC - 134 days CJ w/134 days credit - time served.  The CC on each count is reduced to a civil judgment.
15CM-528  Obst:  1 year prison w/1 year ext supervision - stayed.
2 years probation
15CM-1160  Count 2  Crim Tresspass - 9 mos CJ.  Count 3  DC - 90 days CJ.  Count 4  BJ - 9 mos CJ - concurrent with each other but consecutive to 15CM528 - stayed
2 years probation
Comply with all programming deemed appropriate by the agent w/the compass report.
